about_the_game:
Sym4D, Vive equipment required.

Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win.

For example, combat methods and special features of the game

How to move
Go forward-shake both controls up and down in front
Stopping-Bring both controls up to the side of your head
Battle method
Rotate-one control up to the side of the head
Attack-Press the left trigger button (move control is not possible if left trigger button is pressed)

In the article, the red mark is on the top and is the captain. Defeat 5 captains.

Since this game is free, it cannot be maintained on the network.
If the network doesn't work, don't use it.

Steam supporters say they can't connect to the network, so I don't think they can connect to foreign countries.
Corea has a good network.

This is a game made by 3 people for 2 weeks, and they are currently working on different projects.
Please pray for a better game in the future.

Sym4D, Vive equipment required.

Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win.

For example, combat methods and special features of the game

How to move
Go forward-shake both controls up and down in front
Stopping-Bring both controls up to the side of your head

Rotate-one control up to the side of the head
Attack-Press the left trigger button (move control is not possible if left trigger button is pressed)

In the article, the red mark is on the top and is the captain. Defeat 5 captains.

Since this game is free, it cannot be maintained on the network.
If the network doesn't work, don't use it.

Steam supporters say they can't connect to the network, so I don't think they can connect to foreign countries.

name: My Strong Horse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9750H CPU 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9750H CPU 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win.
